biocontainers.name: gwama
biocontainers.summary: Genome-wide association meta analysis software performs meta-analysis of the results of gwa studies of binary or quantitative phenotypes. fixed- and random-effect meta-analyses are performed for both directly genotyped and imputed snps using estimates of the allelic odds ratio and 95% confidence interval for binary traits, and estimates of the allelic effect size and standard error for quantitative phenotypes.

biotools.summary: Genome-Wide Association Meta Analysis software performs meta-analysis of the results of GWA studies of binary or quantitative phenotypes. Fixed- and random-effect meta-analyses are performed for both directly genotyped and imputed SNPs using estimates of the allelic odds ratio and 95% confidence interval for binary traits, and estimates of the allelic effect size and standard error for quantitative phenotypes.

bioschemas.name: GWAMA
bioschemas.summary: Genome-Wide Association Meta Analysis software performs meta-analysis of the results of GWA studies of binary or quantitative phenotypes. Fixed- and random-effect meta-analyses are performed for both directly genotyped and imputed SNPs using estimates of the allelic odds ratio and 95% confidence interval for binary traits, and estimates of the allelic effect size and standard error for quantitative phenotypes.
